edu.utsa.mobbed

Class Datadefs

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.utsa.mobbed.Datadefs

  • public class Datadefs
extends java.lang.Object
    Handler class for DATADEFS table. The DATADEFS table identifies a piece of data (an array, a blob, or a stream).
    Author:
    Arif Hossain, Jeremy Cockfield, Kay Robbins

      • retrieveBlob

        public static void retrieveBlob(java.sql.Connection dbCon,
                java.lang.String filename,
                java.lang.String entityUuid,
                boolean additional)
                         throws MobbedException
        Retrieves a blob from the database.
        Parameters:
        dbCon - a connection to the database
        filename - the name of the file that the blob will be written to
        entityUuid - the entity UUID that is associated
        additional - true if the blob is addition data, false if otherwise
        Throws:
        MobbedException - if an error occurs

      • retrieveNumericValue

        public static java.lang.Object retrieveNumericValue(java.sql.Connection dbCon,
                                    java.lang.String datadefUuid)
                                             throws MobbedException
        Retrieves a numeric value data definition.
        Parameters:
        dbCon - a connection to the database
        datadefUuid - the data definition UUID that is associated
        Returns:
        a array that contains the numeric value data
        Throws:
        MobbedException - if an error occurs

      • storeBlob

        public static long storeBlob(java.sql.Connection dbCon,
             java.lang.String filename,
             java.lang.String entityUuid,
             boolean additional)
                      throws MobbedException
        Stores a blob in the database.
        Parameters:
        dbCon - a connection to the database
        filename - the name of the file that contains the blob
        entityUuid - the entity UUID that is associated
        additional - true if the blob is addition data, false if otherwise
        Returns:
        a oid associated with the blob stored
        Throws:
        MobbedException - if an error occurs

                     java.lang.Object[] numericValue)
                              throws MobbedException
        Stores a numeric value data definition.
        Parameters:
        dbCon - a connection to the database
        datadefUuid - the data definition UUID that is associated
        numericValue - the values for the numeric values data definition
        Throws:
        MobbedException - if an error occurs

        Parameters:
